attributes.action: caroline coughlan, muchael brown, edith coughlan, terence coughlan, sheila smith, gary smith,sandra brown, robert brown, sally brown,iris coughlan, carl screen, catherine weir, john weir, joel smith, lewis culverwell, ryan culverwell, leyton culverwell,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I saw an advert on the television this evening for a game to be played on the Nintendo WII called BULLY it contains a boy going aound school bullying everyone. I am a mother of three children and find this absolutely discusting, as this country is trying to stop bullying of any kind and will not tolerate it but this type of game is allowed to go on sale. My son has a Nintendo WII and i would never let him play a game like this. Is there any way you can stop this game from being sold please?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
